group_1.textRight: Good job, Sunao!

group_1.textLeft: Shizuka, Charu...thank you for working so hard!

group_1.textRight: The store was pretty busy, especially in the@second half!
Some of the customers from yesterday returned@today.
Did you notice that too, Sunao?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
There were some customers I'd helped before.

group_1.textRight: They were all really impressed by your service and@how you taught them about the daidaikko.
I think they came back because you left such a good@impression on them.
And since you were able to deal with all the difficult@customers,
the other clerks were able to work much more@efficiently.
Charu was able to catch the shoplifter,
and I could focus on my tasks, too!
It's all thanks to you and how patient you were with@your work.
Yeah, exactly!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, both of you.
I'm glad my work had some purpose to it.

group_1.textRight: Charu and I can attest to that.
Your parents, tooâ€” they were keeping a close eye@on you.
Good job!

group_1.textLeft: Oh...
(I was so focused on the customers that I didn't@notice my parents at all...)

group_1.textRight: It looks like you worked really hard, Sunao.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.textRight: Sunao...
I'm sorry.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: Let me apologize, too.

group_1.textLeft: Wait, why are you two...?

group_1.textRight: When we were watching you today, we realized...
Our daughter is doing such a good job...
Why didn't we believe in her?
Sunao, you've grown up to be a much better person@than we could imagine,
but all we've done is worry about you.
We've never been paying attention to your efforts.
Maybe it's too late for regrets, but...
From now on, we'll see you for who you are.
I'm sorry for everything, Sunao.

group_1.textLeft: What do you...mean?

group_1.textRight: You feel responsible for the circumstances that@led you to becoming a Diviner.
You tried so hard not to worry us,
but it was wrong of us to make you feel like any of@this was your fault.
Right, we were trying to make sure you would never@get involved with the Tokime Village.
We were so desperate that we refused to explain@anything.
In the end, however, we should have told you@the truth,
and then the three of us could've been able to work@together as a family.
Sunao, I'm so sorry.

group_1.textLeft: Mom...Dad...thank you.
I wish we could have spoken like this sooner.

group_1.textRight: Yes, you're right...I'm sorry.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, too...
I've been avoiding you because I didn't have any@faith in myself.
But I'm okay now.
I can be confident when I'm with Shizuka and Charu.
It's thanks to you two that I could do this today,
and that I could do my best and reassure my@parents.
Sunao...
Mom, Dad, I have a favor to ask of you.

group_1.textRight: Anything, Sunao.

group_1.textLeft: I know you're worried about me being a Diviner,
but there's a goal I need to fulfill with Shizuka and@Charu.
I'm going to be busy with that for a while.
Mom...Dad...
Please let me go to Kamihama City.
I'm certain you'll worry about me, but Shizuka and@Charu will be by my side.
So please believe in me!

group_1.textCenter: I'm so happy I've found such good friends.
